Title: Two Piece Halter Top Homecoming Dress

Featured-image: 82072-black-two-piece-halter-top-homecoming-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: This fun and funky dress is perfect for a school dance. The halter crop top is adorned with rhinestones with a key hole at the bust. The back of the dress sparkles with the same beaded pattern and cutouts. Short skirt is trimmed at the midriff and sits above the knee for a dance ready style.
